report.title: Try These Herbal/Drug Stacks
report.author: Take A Look
report.bodytext: im a regular user of drugs and i've always experimented with diffenet things and i have figured out some drug stacks that work pretty good i just wanted to let some others know so im emailing them to you, here they are: /n /n Natural Test Experiment. /n /n Two test subjects with full stomaches. /n /n Stack consists of: /n generic metabolifes, Kava Kava', St John's Wart, . and nutmeg. /n /n Test Subject 1: 6 generic metabolifes, 6 Kava Kava's (30% Kava lactones), 6 St John's Wart, 2 tbs. of nutmeg. /n /n this stack basically i found and others who took it basically last about 10hrs and about 3 hrs of peaking, /n /n Postive effects: it makes you feel happy, in a good mood, motivated to have progress in what ever you do, extreme alertness, raises your confidence, and overall give u a content feeling... /n /n Netitive effects that may occur: Heart beats fast, inability to sleep, possably stomache ache... /n /n Here is another, i consider this stack to have better effects than most all drugs! /n /n Fironal or generic brand (butalbital) 6-8 pills, and metablife or generic version 6-8 pills... /n /n These two need to be togeather in order to work good.. its last about 4-5 hrs /n /n This stack gave me and others who tried it the following: /n /n Positive: Extremely confident in what ever you do, great mood, very happy, open to do anything ( you may find yourself talking to everyone you see ), give the body a relaxed feeling. /n /n Negitives that may occur: nose may be run, have to urine frequently, depression after coming down, also firional is very addictive...
